# sumexp

Flow summary by expiration date.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/flow sumexp ticker expiry
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |
| expiry | Expiration Date | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/flow sumexp ticker:AMD expiry:2022-07-29
```
